pageContext.claim: “Exclusive -- Donald Trump Jr. to Obama: My Dad Fixed the Economy You Could Not.”
pageContext.analysis: The historical books are going to view the actions taken in 2008 and 2009 by George W. Bush and Obama — and the Federal Reserve — as pivotal to saving the U.S. economy. Trump, however, has exceeded expectations on jobs and economic growth that were in place at the start of 2017. That’s due in part because of his tax cut, but also because of factors largely beyond his control, such as the increase in oil prices.
